abstract: Choe Kum-Chol (Chosŏn'gŭl: 최금철; Hanja: 崔金哲;born 9 February 1987) is a North Korean international football player who currently plays for Thais club side Nakhonnayok in Regional League Division 2 on loan from Muangthong United.Choe has made eight appearances for the Korea DPR national football team in 2010 FIFA World Cup qualifying matches.
comment: Choe Kum-Chol (Chosŏn'gŭl: 최금철; Hanja: 崔金哲;born 9 February 1987) is a North Korean international football player who currently plays for Thais club side Nakhonnayok in Regional League Division 2 on loan from Muangthong United.Choe has made eight appearances for the Korea DPR national football team in 2010 FIFA World Cup qualifying matches.
